gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hawks 109, Heat 108
gameRecap.excerpt: Dejounte Murray made a top of the arc 3PT with 2.0 seconds left to take a 109-108 lead, as the Hawks held on to defeat the Heat. Murray led the Hawks with 22 points and a season-high 11 assists as Bogdan Bogdanovic (17 points) and Jalen Johnson (15 points, seven rebounds) totaled 32 points. Jimmy Butler (25 points, five rebounds, six assists) led the Heat as Tyler Herro (25 points, four 3PT, six rebounds) and Bam Adebayo (21 points, nine rebounds, six assists) totaled 46.
